fields.title: ARTifACT
fields.map_url: Grotere kaart weergeven
fields.public_transport:
Our lessons are taught at Huis van de Wijk Lydia, this is a community centre in Amsterdam Zuid.
The entrance for Artifact is at Bronckhorststraat 3. It is really easy to reach by public transport; take tram 3, 5 12 or bus 358 to Roelof Hartplein. You’ll see the Artifact sign on the door.

fields.title: CREA
fields.map_url: View Larger Map

fields.title: De Krakeling
fields.map_url: Krakeling Souterrein weergeven op een grotere kaart
fields.public_transport: Trams 7 and 10 and buses 145, 170, 172 and N70 all stop just outside on Raamplein. Meanwhile, at the nearby Leidseplein, you can get to with trams 1, 2 and 5.
fields.by_car: If you need to come by car, there is parking across the street on the Raamplein or down the road at the Europarking. For more information see the krakeling site.

fields.description: In this 8 week course you will learn all the basic skills of improv. Beginning moments, object work and physical activity on stage are primary focuses. Students will learn basic performance games. The classes are very active - every game or exercise will be practised by everyone, so everyone gets many chances to get up and play. You will learn individual performance and presentation skills and how to work in a team.
fields.title: Improvisation Level 1 - Basics

fields.description:
In this class you will learn how to master your basic improv games and add that professionalism and polish to your scene work. The course concludes with a show on the easylaughs stage and much of the course will be geared towards getting that show as slick and self-assured as possible.

You must have taken Level 1 with easylaughs to take Level 2. Foundation courses end with a student show
fields.title: Improvisation Level 2 - Beyond the Basics

fields.description: In this 8 week course you will learn all the basic skills of improv. Beginning moments, object work and physical activity on stage are primary focuses. Students will learn basic performance games. The classes are very active - every game or exercise will be practised by everyone, so everyone gets many chances to get up and play. You will learn individual performance and presentation skills and how to work in a team.
fields.title: Improvisation Level 1 - Basics

fields.description:
In this course, we move away from the safety of preset games into the freeing world of open scenes. We find out how to create, steer and end scenes with and without structure. Using characters to drive the scene and to go beyond the scene to create a story, a theme or a world (this is what we call longform).

You must have taken Levels 1 and 2 with easylaughs to take Level 3.
fields.title: Improvisation Level 3 - Getting in Deeper
